text: Hamcunin mardon va zanoni sumo, ki murtakiʙi zino mesavand, onhoro sarzanis va ajʙcui kuned va ʙo amali zadane, ki az in amali zist ʙozason dorad, ʙijozored. (Binoʙar in hargoh mardon murtakiʙi zino savand, mavridi azijat va ozor qaror megirand va zanon zindoni va azijat mesavand. Pas zindoni kardan, to zamoni faro rasidani marg ast va ozor rasondan, to vaqtest, ki fard tavʙa kunad va ʙa islohi xud ʙipardozad. Binoʙar in farmud:) Va agar tavʙa kardand va ʙa isloh pardoxtand, onhoro raho kuned, hamono Alloh tavʙapaziru mehruʙon ast
